name: Winter Snow Driving - Crazy Auto Tuk Tuk Taxi
name_original: Winter Snow Driving - Crazy Auto Tuk Tuk Taxi
description:
Play Winter Snow Driving - Crazy Auto Tuk Tuk Taxi and transport tourists. Be extremely careful of ice and drive carefully. Make sure you don’t skid, pick up the passengers in time and drop them off safely.

 This fun game will test your skills of acceleration, steering, driving and parking on hills. Tourists are out there waiting for transport and your expertise sure can come in handy. So have fun and drive your heart out!

Please share your feedback and suggestions so that we can work on improving the game for you.
